name: Online Game: I Can Evolve Everything
author: 普鲁斯特文化
content: Betrayed by his best friend, our protagonist loses everything: billions in wealth, his loved ones, and even his legs. In “Online Game: I Can Evolve Everything,” he gets a second chance at life. Reborn with a burning desire for vengeance, he vows to reclaim everything that was taken from him.When a revolutionary online game arrives, he finds himself at an advantage.
